title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7305.6 - Medical screening
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7305.6 - Medical screening

State Regulations
A medical screening questionnaire shall be administered by
facility staff at the time of admission, or prior to the placement of a youth
in a facility housing unit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7305.6

Adopted

New

York State Register September 26, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 39, eff. 9/26/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
